amendment.description: Amendment sought to match the President's budget request for Overseas Contingency Operations.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 39 printed in Part B of House Report 113-108 to match the President's budget request for Overseas Contingency Operations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Van Hollen amendment (A031) Failed by recorded vote: 191 - 232 (Roll no. 240).
